payout_limit.title: Hidden payout limit
payout_limit.explanation: You may insure for more, but the insurer will only reimburse up to the maximum listed.

metadata.why: Insurers often cap item payouts even when users enter higher values.
metadata.suggested_action: Confirm item category payout limits with insurer.

reporting_window.title: Strict reporting window
reporting_window.explanation: Failure to report an incident within the specified time window can void your claim.

metadata.why: Late reporting is a common reason for claim rejection.
metadata.suggested_action: Note the reporting deadline and act immediately after an incident.

excess.title: High or additional excess
excess.explanation: You are responsible for this amount before the insurer pays anything.

metadata.why: Excess amounts can be higher than expected, especially for specific items.
metadata.suggested_action: Ensure you can afford the excess amount.

unattended_property.title: Unattended property exclusion
unattended_property.explanation: Theft from unattended vehicles or property is often excluded unless specific conditions are met (e.g., locked in boot).

metadata.why: Common exclusion for theft claims.
metadata.suggested_action: Never leave items visible in an unattended vehicle.

electrical_damage.title: Electrical damage exclusion
electrical_damage.explanation: Damage caused by power surges or electrical faults may be excluded or require specific protection.

metadata.why: Load shedding and grid instability make this a high-risk area.
metadata.suggested_action: Check if power surge cover is included or optional.

wear_and_tear.title: Wear and tear exclusion
wear_and_tear.explanation: Damage due to aging or lack of maintenance is not covered.

metadata.why: Insurance covers sudden events, not maintenance issues.
metadata.suggested_action: Maintain your property regularly.

acts_of_god.title: Acts of God / Force Majeure
acts_of_god.explanation: Certain natural events may be excluded or have limited cover.

metadata.why: Catastrophic events can be excluded.
metadata.suggested_action: Check specific natural peril coverage (flood, earthquake).

specified_items.title: Unspecified items limit
specified_items.explanation: High-value items must be listed individually to be fully covered.

metadata.why: General contents cover has a per-item limit.
metadata.suggested_action: Specify high-value items like jewelry and electronics.

automatic_renewal.title: Automatic renewal
automatic_renewal.explanation: The policy may renew automatically unless you cancel it.

metadata.why: You might be charged for another year if you forget to cancel.
metadata.suggested_action: Set a reminder for the renewal date.

maintenance_obligation.title: Maintenance obligation
maintenance_obligation.explanation: You must maintain your property; negligence can void claims.

metadata.why: Insurers require you to prevent loss.
metadata.suggested_action: Keep proof of maintenance.

security_requirements.title: Security requirements
security_requirements.explanation: Theft cover often depends on specific security measures being active.

metadata.why: If the alarm wasn't on, the claim might be rejected.
metadata.suggested_action: Ensure all security devices are functional and used.

false_statement_voids.title: False statement voids policy
false_statement_voids.explanation: Any false information provided can void the entire policy.

metadata.why: Honesty is essential for valid cover.
metadata.suggested_action: Double-check all information provided.

arbitration_clause.title: Arbitration clause
arbitration_clause.explanation: Disputes may need to be settled via arbitration rather than court.

metadata.why: Can limit your legal options.
metadata.suggested_action: Understand the dispute resolution process.

cancellation_penalty.title: Cancellation penalty
cancellation_penalty.explanation: You may be charged a fee for cancelling the policy early.

metadata.why: Discourages switching insurers.
metadata.suggested_action: Check cancellation terms before signing.

subrogation.title: Subrogation rights
subrogation.explanation: The insurer can pursue third parties for recovery in your name.

metadata.why: Standard practice, but good to know.
metadata.suggested_action: Cooperate with the insurer in recovery actions.

depreciation.title: Depreciation / Betterment
depreciation.explanation: Payouts may be reduced based on the age and condition of the item.

metadata.why: You might not get 'new for old' replacement.
metadata.suggested_action: Check if cover is replacement value or market value.

exclusions_general.title: General exclusions
exclusions_general.explanation: Pay attention to the list of general exclusions.

metadata.why: Defines what is definitely not covered.
metadata.suggested_action: Read the exclusions section carefully.

consequential_loss.title: Consequential loss exclusion
consequential_loss.explanation: Indirect losses resulting from an insured event are not covered.

metadata.why: Insurance covers direct damage, not side effects.
metadata.suggested_action: Consider business interruption cover if relevant.

average_clause.title: Average clause (Underinsurance)
average_clause.explanation: If you are underinsured, claims will be reduced proportionally.

metadata.why: Severe penalty for underestimating value.
metadata.suggested_action: Ensure sum insured represents full replacement value.

premium_increase.title: Premium increase rights
premium_increase.explanation: The insurer reserves the right to increase premiums.

metadata.why: Premiums aren't fixed forever.
metadata.suggested_action: Budget for potential increases.

waiting_period.title: Waiting period
waiting_period.explanation: You cannot claim for events happening shortly after the policy starts.

metadata.why: Prevents signing up only when a loss is imminent.
metadata.suggested_action: Be aware of when full cover kicks in.

territorial_limits.title: Territorial limits
territorial_limits.explanation: Cover is limited to specific geographic areas.

metadata.why: Taking items abroad might require extra cover.
metadata.suggested_action: Check travel insurance for items taken overseas.

keys_locks.title: Keys and locks limit
keys_locks.explanation: Cover for replacing locks and keys is often limited.

metadata.why: Can be expensive to replace all locks.
metadata.suggested_action: Check the specific limit for keys.

glass_breakage.title: Glass breakage
glass_breakage.explanation: Glass coverage might have specific excesses or limits.

metadata.why: Common claim type.
metadata.suggested_action: Check if glass claims affect no-claims bonus.

water_damage.title: Water damage restrictions
water_damage.explanation: Water damage might be excluded if due to maintenance issues.

metadata.why: Gradual leaks are maintenance, not insurance.
metadata.suggested_action: Maintain plumbing regularly.

subsidence.title: Subsidence and landslip
subsidence.explanation: Damage from ground movement is often excluded or optional.

metadata.why: High-risk structural damage.
metadata.suggested_action: Check if your area is prone to subsidence.

riot_strike.title: Riot and strike (SASRIA)
riot_strike.explanation: Political violence is usually covered by SASRIA in South Africa.

metadata.why: Standard insurers exclude this.
metadata.suggested_action: Ensure SASRIA cover is included.

business_use.title: Business use exclusion
business_use.explanation: Personal policies often exclude items used for business.

metadata.why: Business risks differ from personal risks.
metadata.suggested_action: Declare business use of vehicles or equipment.

unoccupied_residence.title: Unoccupied residence
unoccupied_residence.explanation: Cover may cease if the home is unoccupied for a long period.

metadata.why: Empty homes are high risk.
metadata.suggested_action: Notify insurer if away for extended periods.

tenants.title: Tenant behavior
tenants.explanation: Landlord policies might exclude malicious damage by tenants.

metadata.why: Tenant vetting is the owner's responsibility.
metadata.suggested_action: Check landlord specific inclusions.

matching_sets.title: Matching sets and pairs
matching_sets.explanation: If one item of a set is lost, the insurer might not replace the whole set.

metadata.why: They only pay for the lost item.
metadata.suggested_action: Be aware of mismatched sets after a claim.

accidental_damage.title: Accidental damage
accidental_damage.explanation: Accidental damage (dropping things) is often an optional add-on.

metadata.why: Standard cover is for specific events (fire, theft).
metadata.suggested_action: Add accidental damage for expensive electronics.

mechanical_breakdown.title: Mechanical breakdown
mechanical_breakdown.explanation: Internal failure of machines is not covered (warranties cover this).

metadata.why: Insurance is for external events.
metadata.suggested_action: Rely on warranties for breakdown.

pest_infestation.title: Pest infestation
pest_infestation.explanation: Damage by pests is typically excluded.

metadata.why: Considered a maintenance issue.
metadata.suggested_action: Pest control is your responsibility.

defective_workmanship.title: Defective workmanship
defective_workmanship.explanation: Damage caused by bad building or repair work is not covered.

metadata.why: Insurer doesn't guarantee contractors' quality.
metadata.suggested_action: Use reputable contractors.

pollution.title: Pollution and contamination
pollution.explanation: Cleanup costs for pollution are often excluded.

metadata.why: Environmental liability is specialized.
metadata.suggested_action: Check if you have specific risks here.

nuclear_war.title: War and nuclear risks
nuclear_war.explanation: Standard exclusion for war and nuclear events.

metadata.why: Global catastrophes are uninsurable by standard means.
metadata.suggested_action: Standard exclusion everywhere.

cyber_risk.title: Cyber risk exclusion
cyber_risk.explanation: Loss of data or cyber attacks are often excluded from property policies.

metadata.why: Requires specialized cyber insurance.
metadata.suggested_action: Back up data regularly.

illegal_activities.title: Illegal activities
illegal_activities.explanation: Losses connected to illegal acts by the insured are not covered.

metadata.why: Public policy prevents insuring crime.
metadata.suggested_action: Don't do illegal things.

confiscation.title: Confiscation by authorities
confiscation.explanation: Legal seizure of property is not covered.

metadata.why: Legal process is not an insurable risk.
metadata.suggested_action: Comply with laws.

proof_of_ownership.title: Proof of ownership
proof_of_ownership.explanation: You must prove you owned the items claimed for.

metadata.why: Prevents fraudulent claims.
metadata.suggested_action: Keep receipts and photos of valuables.

salvage.title: Rights to salvage
salvage.explanation: If the insurer pays out for an item, they own the damaged remains.

metadata.why: Prevents you profiting from the loss.
metadata.suggested_action: Don't dispose of damaged items until authorized.

claims_history.title: Claims history impact
claims_history.explanation: Claiming affects your future premiums and bonuses.

metadata.why: Insurance works on risk profiling.
metadata.suggested_action: Consider not claiming for small amounts.

driver_restrictions.title: Driver restrictions
driver_restrictions.explanation: Vehicle cover might be limited to specific drivers.

metadata.why: Risk is based on the driver.
metadata.suggested_action: Ensure all drivers are nominated.

vehicle_use.title: Vehicle use description
vehicle_use.explanation: Using the vehicle for the wrong purpose (e.g., delivery) voids cover.

metadata.why: Delivery/taxi use is higher risk.
metadata.suggested_action: Be honest about vehicle use.

roadworthiness.title: Roadworthiness
roadworthiness.explanation: The vehicle must be roadworthy for the claim to be valid.

metadata.why: Unsafe cars cause accidents.
metadata.suggested_action: Check tyres and brakes.

alcohol_drugs.title: Alcohol and drugs
alcohol_drugs.explanation: No cover if the driver was under the influence.

metadata.why: Illegal and high risk.
metadata.suggested_action: Don't drink and drive.

unlicensed_driving.title: Unlicensed driving
unlicensed_driving.explanation: Driver must have a valid licence.

metadata.why: Illegal.
metadata.suggested_action: Renew your licence.

modification.title: Vehicle modifications
modification.explanation: Modifications must be declared or they aren't covered.

metadata.why: Changes value and risk.
metadata.suggested_action: Tell insurer about any mods.

tracking_device.title: Tracking device requirement
tracking_device.explanation: Theft cover may require a working tracking device.

metadata.why: Increases recovery chance.
metadata.suggested_action: Test your tracker regularly.

automatic_renewal.title: Automatic lease renewal
automatic_renewal.explanation: The lease may automatically renew for another term if you don't give notice in time.

deposit_forfeiture.title: Deposit forfeiture clause
deposit_forfeiture.explanation: Certain conditions may allow the landlord to keep your deposit unfairly.

maintenance_responsibility.title: Tenant maintenance burden
maintenance_responsibility.explanation: The lease may shift structural or major maintenance costs to the tenant.

non_compete.title: Restrictive non-compete
non_compete.explanation: This clause may prevent you from working in your industry for a period after leaving.

intellectual_property.title: Broad IP assignment
intellectual_property.explanation: The employer may claim ownership of everything you create, even outside of work hours.

termination_without_cause.title: Termination without cause
termination_without_cause.explanation: You could be fired at any time without a specific reason or fair warning.

hidden_fees.title: Hidden fees or penalties
hidden_fees.explanation: Look out for extra costs that aren't part of the main price.

vague_terms.title: Vague or ambiguous terms
vague_terms.explanation: Vague language gives the other party more power to interpret the contract in their favor.
